events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I did not get what I paid for.
The system detected keywords related to refund and has categorized the case accordingly for proper handling.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refund requests to ensure quick resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the wrong product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the product you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 1234567 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product delivered to me.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund process. Thank you for resolving this issue swiftly.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your account in a few days to confirm the refund receipt.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
